IncidentDef.label: green tiberium asteroid
IncidentDef.letterText:
An unusual meteorite has crashed nearby and made a crater.

There seems to be some unusual crystals poking out of it, and a few have broken off and scattered around the site.

Be careful, the substance could be dangerous!
